Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Regulates political contributions and expenditures by limited liability companies and other entities
Summary: Regulates political contributions and expenditures by limited liability companies and the reporting thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the limited liability company law and the election law, in relation to political contributions and expenditures by limited liability companies and other entities
